fullplot: Christy Brown is a spastic quadriplegic born to a large, poor Irish family. His mother, Mrs Brown, recognizes the intelligence and humanity in the lad everyone else regards as a vegetable. Eventually, Christy matures into a cantankerous writer who uses his only functional limb, his left foot, to write with.
plot: Christy Brown, born with cerebral palsy, learns to paint and write with his only controllable limb - his left foot.
title: My Left Foot
